credit_line: Gift of the son and daughters of Charles Bolles Bolles-Rogers, Class of 1907: Frederick Van D. Rogers, Mary Rogers Savage, and Nancy Rogers Pierson
title: Large Standing Draped Woman
description: Probably grave offering from Tanagra necropolis. Stands in contrapposto balanced on right leg, and wears lampadion-type updo. Surviving polychromy is limited to matte, dark red on hair.
